caption.p: Additional file 4: Figure S3. (a) Clinical isolate exposed to CNB oil showed increased chitin content. The clinical isolate from blood at log phase after 4 h exposure to CNB oil at MIC and 1/2 MIC were stained with CFW. Images represent CFW (top panel) and bright field (BF; bottom panel). Bar = 5 μm. (b) Genital clinical isolate with comparable MIC to RSY150 showed a normal chitin distribution.
